Description: Wooden head-rest; nineteen lines of Hieroglyphic text beneath the base.
Curator's comments: PM I Part 2: p.842 For coffin ofTa'awet daughter of Hori and relative of Besenmut, see RC 2071 (San Jose 2004, p.27).
Bibliographic references: Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 83)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1998/9 Oct-Jun, South Carolina, The Charleston Museum, Queens Commoners of the New Kingdom 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead
